ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMD_CONTASFINANCEIRASExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = entity command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciFAT command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True
def OnCMD_REABRIRExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Deseja reabrir esta nota fiscal para edição?")
def OnCMD_COPIARExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma cópia de nota?")
